sectiondef.header: ui.h - The user interface header file.

detaileddescription.para: Enumeration of the different predefined viewport configurations.

xrefdescription.para: this should be later user configurable

briefdescription.para: Missile to show when you click.

detaileddescription.para: Missile to show when you click.
Hash table of all the button styles

briefdescription.para: Up to 11 keys used for group selection.

detaileddescription.para: Clean up the user interface module.
Get popup class pointer by string identifier.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the style to find.

simplesect.para: Button style, NULL if not found.

briefdescription.para: Called if the mouse is moved in Normal interface state.
Called if any mouse button is pressed down.

detaileddescription.para: Called if mouse button pressed down.

briefdescription.para: Called if any mouse button is released up.
Get viewport for screen pixel position.

detaileddescription.para: Takes coordinates of a pixel in stratagus's window and computes the map viewport which contains this pixel.

parameterdescription.para: pixel coordinate with origin at UL corner of screen

simplesect.para: viewport pointer or NULL if this pixel is not inside any of the viewports.
This functions only works with rectangular viewports, when we support shaped map window, this must be rewritten.

briefdescription.para: Cycle through all available viewport modes.

detaileddescription.para: Cycles through predefined viewport modes (geometry configurations) in order defined by the ViewportMode enumerated type.

parameterdescription.para: The size of step used for cycling. Values that make sense are mostly 1 (next viewport mode) and -1 (previous viewport mode).

detaileddescription.para: Sets up (calls geometry setup routines for) a new viewport mode.
Sets up a new viewport mode.

briefdescription.para: Check if mouse scrolling is enabled.

detaileddescription.para: Check if mouse scrolling is enabled

parameterdescription.para: True to enable mouse scrolling, false to disable

briefdescription.para: Check if keyboard scrolling is enabled.

detaileddescription.para: Check if keyboard scrolling is enabled

parameterdescription.para: True to enable keyboard scrolling, false to disable

briefdescription.para: Check if mouse grabbing is enabled.

detaileddescription.para: Check if mouse grabbing is enabled

parameterdescription.para: True to enable mouse grabbing, false to disable

briefdescription.para: Check if scrolling stops when leaving the window.

detaileddescription.para: Check if scrolling stops when leaving the window

briefdescription.para: Enable/disable leaving the window stops scrolling.

detaileddescription.para: Enable/disable leaving the window stops scrolling

parameterdescription.para: True to stop scrolling, false to disable

detaileddescription.para: Add a Lua handler FIXME: when should these be freed?

briefdescription.para: Check if Demo/Attract mode is in progress.

detaileddescription.para: Check if the game is running in Demo mode.

simplesect.para: True if the game is in demo mode, false otherwise
